attributes.action: Xl bullies shouldn’t be banned in uk
attributes.background: Bully breed is the softest dog ever they really good with around family kids or any other dogs it shouldn’t be banned these are dogs are not dangerous it’s the owners

rejection.details:
There are no current plans to ban "Xl bullies" in the UK. We're therefore not sure what action you'd like to see. 

If you want to see a specific change to the current laws, we could accept a petition about that. For example, this petition has been published: 

Repeal the current Dangerous Dogs Act and replace with new framework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624876
